NOTE: When getting or setting “isFocused” it’s necessary
to cast the item type to ensure this “isFocused” is hit
because of existence of UIView.isFocused (readonly).
Cast using (view is ControlStateAccessible).isFocused.
With regard to the getter, if focused is not already
set on the item (via ControlStateAccessible, etc)
this will return the current UIView.isFocused value.
